mapper.select: select login_name loginName,password password,sex sex from dm_user where login_name ="123"
select login_name loginName,password password,sex sex from dm_user
/*别名可以直接字段加空格加别名 或者字段加as 再加别名，loginName as "loginName"*/ select login_name loginName,password password,sex sex from dm_user where login_name ="123"
select login_name loginName,password password,sex sex from dm_user where login_name ="123"
mapper.insert: /*判断参数映射的名称问题*/ insert into dm_user ( login_name, password) VALUES (#{login},#{pass})
